summary: The Khajit\'s Night Eye power, in spell form.
descriptionHtml:
A somewhat crude but effective spell, that gives you the night eye effect.

The Spelltome is craftable at the blacksmith\'s forge (not realistic I know, but I don\'t want to screw with the level lists needed to add to merchants) using no material at all. 

The effect of the spell should last until you cast it again and has a magic cost of zero. I\'m not sure if this is because the effect is from a power rather than a spell or because it says it has a duration of zero.

As I said this is a crude version of the spell made using hex editing, I\'m pretty far into the game and have yet to experience any problems but some way still crop up. So use at your own discretion.

Update: Fixed the formids, hopefully. Thanks to BlazesRus for the help.
author: Gawl40
